LanguageData.GIBed.label: Haybed
LanguageData.GIBed.description: A stack of hay perfect for a gigantic creature to sleep on.
LanguageData.GIDBed.label: Big Haybed
LanguageData.GIDBed.description: A huge stack of hay that can fit two of gigantic creatures.
LanguageData.GIhardbed.label: Bedrock
LanguageData.GIhardbed.description: A bed out of a soild rock, get it? It is easier to keep tidy and regulate temperature.

LanguageData.GIDhardbed.description: A bed out of a soild rock, get it? It is easier to keep tidy and regulate temperature.
